body:
When was the last time I agreed with @Xigbar68? Uh, never?

These permabans are absolutely ridiculous. I get the admins want to shape the site and they "technically broke the ToS" but if the admins can change the ToS to ban people they can do the opposite as well. The threshold shown today is way too triggerhappy and exactly the catalyst needed to ban people on virtually anything down the line.

Nah dude. You're right on semantics but the ToS on User Safety is so vague, I don't think even you believed the line was going to be drawn here. For a site that really wants to push freedom of speech that's some bullshit.

Again, I think the admins have good intentions, but if there wasn't drama for the past month I don't think they would have drawn the line here either. I'm definitely someone who stirred the pot too so I take some responsibility tho
